name: attendance-tracker-ts
description: Attendance Management System with Firebase Hosting

scripts.deploy:functions: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ./functions/copy-prisma.ps1 && cd functions && npm install && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:frontend && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ./functions/copy-prisma.ps1 && cd functions && npm install && cd .. && npm run build:frontend && firebase deploy
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:functions
